name: Browsersynclearningroadmap
body:
Welcome to Browser-sync!

Starting Stylus watch and Browser-sync on Static Server

stylus -w foldername  

browser-sync start --proxy "testweb.dev" --files "*.php, css/*.css, js/*.js"

browser-sync start --proxy "event-registration.dev" --files "*.php, css/*.css, js/*.js"


Starting Stylus watch and Browser-sync on Static Server
  
stylus -w foldername 

browser-sync start --server --files "css/*.css, *.html"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
